incidents.title: UC Media Server high memory — transcoding backlog
incidents.description: Memory usage spiked to 92% on eu-west-1 media server. Transcoding queue backed up to 2400 items. Video calls dropping frames.

incidents.title: Redis Session Store eviction rate elevated
incidents.description: Session store memory at 88%. LRU evictions increasing. Risk of session drops for active PTT users.

incidents.title: Kafka consumer lag on PTT event topic
incidents.description: Consumer group ptt-analytics lagging by 50K messages. Dashboard metrics delayed.

incidents.title: Auth service certificate expiring in 72 hours
incidents.description: TLS certificate for auth.uc.internal expiring 2026-02-27. Auto-renewal failed due to DNS challenge timeout.

incidents.title: SIP Proxy 503 errors in ap-south-1
incidents.description: Intermittent 503 responses on SIP registration endpoint. Affecting ~3% of users in India region.

incidents.title: PostgreSQL replication lag spike
incidents.description: Read replica lag spiked to 45s during bulk analytics export. Some read queries serving stale data.

incidents.title: CDN cache invalidation delay — stale configs served
incidents.description: Config push to CDN edge nodes delayed by 45 min. Some clients received stale SRTP key material.
